name: Perfect Fools
description: Perfect Fools is an international creative agency that embraces the now and new to solve business challenges through innovation and creativity. Based in Stockholm and Amsterdam we work with brands from across the world thanks to our understanding of cultural trends and technology. Over the years we’ve had the good fortune to serve many of the world’s leading brands including: adidas, Absolut Vodka, Peak Performance, Urbanears, Marshall, Battery Energy Drink and more.
